title: Stern: OpenType & Hot Metal
content:

author: kegler

comments.content:
Newsflash!!! Blackbeard was found drowned today in Narraganset Bay. It seems he had stolen lead type and overloaded his galley. The galley sunk with all aboard. Blackbeard's body was found by unsuspecting quohoggers. Blackbeard's family was out of sorts when they heard the news.

ChrisL
Yes. I just ordered some shadow boxes last week and of course I am getting Stern metal. Thank You P22 !
